description: Hearty red lentils and sweet butternut squash are blended to creamy perfection and topped with a drizzle of coconut milk and curry spiced croutons to make this luscious vegan soup.
name: Red Lentil Butternut Squash Soup with Curry Croutons
recipeIngredient: 1 cup full fat coconut milk, (plus more for serving, if you like)
1 tablespoon maple syrup, (or to taste, depending on how sweet your squash is)

recipeInstructions.text: Coat the bottom of a large pot with oil and place it over medium heat. When the oil is hot, add the onion and sauté until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic, ginger, cumin and cinnamon. Continue to sauté until very fragrant, about 1 minute.

Stir in the broth, coconut milk, butternut squash, and lentils. Raise the heat and bring the mixture to a boil. Lower heat and allow to simmer, uncovered, for 20-25 minutes, until the lentils and squash are very tender.
Either use an immersion blender or transfer the soup to a blender in batches, and blend until smooth.
Return the soup to the pot and stir in the lime juice, maple syrup, salt and pepper. Reheat if necessary.
